name: Bloom Marketing
description:
Bloom Digital Marketing is a search engine marketing agency located in Vancouver BC. We specialize in SEO, PPC, Social Media, Google Analytics and Web Site Content Writing. Bloom is a Google Adwords Qualified Company.
Founded in 2006, Bloom Digital Marketing works with small, medium and large companies in the financial, travel and hospitality, e-commerce, consumer products, B2B and other industries.
